short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to open the current tab in a new incognito window

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A dead simple extension that shows a context menu to open the current tab in a new incognito window. 

This is useful while reading a article when you hit a payment wall. Quick open in incognito and enjoy!
